quotes: Ambassador Josette Sheeran is a decorated diplomat, humanitarian, entrepreneur and technology leader recognized by Forbes as the 30th most powerful woman in the world in 2011.
In 2012 she pioneered public blockchain to provide refugee support in war zones.

She headed the World Food Program, which was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2020, leading the world's biggest humanitarian supply chains, with more than 18,000 staff delivering more than 20 billion meals a year to war and disaster zones.
